actions.name: BackupDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to perform backup operation on a specified database

actions.name: DeleteResourcePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the SSM for SAP level resource permissions associated with a SSM for SAP database resource

actions.name: DeregisterApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an SAP application with SSM for SAP

actions.name: GetApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to access information about an application registered with SSM for SAP by providing the application ID or application ARN

actions.name: GetComponent
actions.description: Grants permission to access information about a component registered with SSM for SAP by providing the application ID and component ID

actions.name: GetDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to access information about a database registered with SSM for SAP by providing the application ID, component ID, and database ID

actions.name: GetOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to access information about an operation by providing its operation ID

actions.name: GetResourcePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to get the SSM for SAP level resource permissions associated with a SSM for SAP database resource

actions.name: ListApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all applications registered with SSM for SAP under the customer AWS account

actions.name: ListComponents
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all components in the account of customer, or a specific application

actions.name: ListDatabases
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all databases in the account of customer, or a specific application

actions.name: ListOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all operations in the account of customer, additional filters can be applied

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags on a specified resource ARN

actions.name: PutResourcePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to add the SSM for SAP level resource permissions associated with a SSM for SAP database resource

actions.name: RegisterApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to registers an SAP application with SSM for SAP

actions.name: RestoreDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to restore a database from another database

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a specified resource ARN

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a specified resource ARN

actions.name: UpdateApplicationSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update settings of a registered SSM for SAP application

actions.name: UpdateHANABackupSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update the HANA backup settings of a specified database
